Interface ec.time.TimeOfDay

public interface interface TimeOfDay
TimeOfDay is the interface representing access to the current date, time, etc. Note that there is no simply-instantiable implementation of this for guest code.

currentTimeMillis()
{This description is cribbed from JLS 1st edition, section 20.18.6.} Return the difference in msec, between the current time and the "standard base time" (i.e., 00:00:00 GMT on January 1, 1970).

currentTimeMillis 
 public abstract long currentTimeMillis()
{This description is cribbed from JLS 1st edition, section 20.18.6.} Return the difference in msec, between the current time and the "standard base time" (i.e., 00:00:00 GMT on January 1, 1970).

Returns:
the current time in msec
